Email Conversation Export
=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 13:35:30

--------------------------------------------------
ID: C1QKBED_00
From: One Reach <OneReach@chalhoub.com>
To: 
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-05-19 19:24
Subject: Urgent: Oracle Cloud Services Outage Resolved
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/> 

 

Dear Colleague, 

Our teams have confirmed that stock delta updates from SIOCS to E-Commerce are now functioning as expected. Transactions from XStore and E-Commerce sales will be successfully posted into SIOCS prior to midnight, ensuring accurate stock snapshots are reflected across E-Commerce platforms.

 

As a precautionary measure, a full reconciliation activity will be conducted over the next 24 hours to validate that the recent outage has not impacted stock accuracy.

 

We will continue to closely monitor all systems to ensure stability and optimal performance.

 

For support during this period, please raise a ticket via OneReach. You can also check real-time status updates via the Tech&Data System Status & Health <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/>  Dashboard.

 

 

 

This mail was sent to you by

 <https://onereach.chalhoub.com/support/home>
